name: GPT-5.2-Codex
description: OpenAI's most advanced agentic coding model, optimized for complex software engineering and defensive cybersecurity. Features state-of-the-art performance on SWE-Bench Pro and Terminal-Bench 2.0 with improved long-context understanding, reliable tool calling, and significantly stronger cybersecurity capabilities compared to previous models.
community_quotes: Achieves state-of-the-art performance on SWE-Bench Pro and Terminal-Bench 2.0
Significantly stronger cybersecurity capabilities than any previous OpenAI model
Better at long-context understanding and reliable tool calling
More effective at agentic coding in native Windows environments
Can reliably complete complex tasks like large refactors and code migrations

name: IQuest Coder V1
description: Open-source coding AI model family from Ubiquant's IQuest Lab featuring innovative Code-Flow training that learns from repository evolution patterns and commit transitions. Achieves state-of-the-art performance on major benchmarks including SWE-Bench Verified (81.4%), beating models 10-20x its size with only 40B parameters.
community_quotes: Matches or beats Claude Sonnet 4.5 and GPT models with only 40B parameters
Uses 20x fewer resources than competitors while delivering superior performance
First coding AI of 2026 from a Chinese quantitative hedge fund
Introduces novel Code-Flow training paradigm that learns from code evolution
Fully open source and can be self-hosted
Specialized variants: Thinking (for complex reasoning) and Instruct (for general coding)
